title: Edward Johnston
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20150101032216/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Designers](http://web.archive.org/web/20150101032216/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Designers) : Edward Johnston**

English letterer most famous for his book [Writing & Illuminating, & Lettering](http://web.archive.org/web/20150101032216/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Writing%20and%20Illuminating%20and%20Lettering) and his commissioned work on the lettering for the [London Underground](http://web.archive.org/web/20150101032216/http:/typophile.com/wiki/London%20Underground), which was later turned into a typeface for use by the same organization and, famously, served as the basis for [Eric Gill](http://web.archive.org/web/20150101032216/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Eric%20Gill)'s [Gill Sans](http://web.archive.org/web/20150101032216/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Gill%20Sans).
author: negativespace
